v.v: The heavens declare the glory of God,
Day after day speech pours out;
There is no speech or spoken words;
Yet their words go out over all the earth,
The sun is like a bridegroom coming out of his chamber
The sun rises from the one horizon
The law of Yahweh is perfect, restoring the soul;
The instructions of Yahweh are right, making the heart glad;
The fear of Yahweh is pure, enduring forever;
They are of greater value than gold, even more than much fine gold;
Yes, by them your servant is warned;
Who can discern all his own errors?
Keep your servant also from arrogant sins;
May the words of my mouth and the thoughts of my heart

v: and the skies make his handiwork known!
night after night it reveals knowledge.
and their speech to the end of the world.
He has pitched a tent for the sun among them.
and like a strong man who rejoices when he runs his race.
and crosses the sky to the other;
the testimony of Yahweh is reliable, making the simple wise.
the commandment of Yahweh is pure, bringing light to the eyes.
the righteous decrees of Yahweh are true and altogether right!
they are sweeter than honey and the dripping honey from the honeycomb.
in obeying them there is great reward.
let them not rule over me.
and I will be innocent from many transgressions.
Yahweh, my rock and my redeemer.
